content: {"name": "Brooklyn Rescue Mission Urban Harvest Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "By Appointment March- December. Registered pantry users can schedule an appointment through the Plentiful app https://www.plentifulapp.com/ or text START to 726-879\n", "email": "", "url": "http://brmuhc.org/urban-harvest-food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "426 Decatur Street", "address_2": "Storefront", "city": "Brooklyn", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11233", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.681629, "longitude": -73.926788}, "phones": [{"number": "(917) 426-3001", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}]}
